parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the [GetQueryOptimizeDataStats](~~405261~~) operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: RuleIds
parameters.description: The tag ID. For more information, see [Query governance](~~290038~~).

parameters.name: SqlId
parameters.description: The SQL template ID. You can call the [GetQueryOptimizeDataStats](~~405261~~) operation to query the SQL template ID.
